casebody.data:
John Mark WEBB, Petitioner-Appellant, v. UNITED STATES of America, Respondent-Appellee. No. 28843. United States Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. Aug. 24, 1971. Milam L. R. Wade, Dallas, Tex., Roger C. Rocha, Laredo, Tex., for petitioner-appellant. Anthony J. P. Farris, U. S. Atty., James R. Gough, Asst. U. S. Atty., Houston, Tex., for respondent-appellee.

Before GEWIN, GOLDBERG and DYER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The final order of the District Court, denying petitioner’s § 2255 application, is affirmed. Smedberg v. United States, 5 Cir. 1971, 448 F.2d 401.

Affirmed.
